mapper.select: select c1.no as no , c1.closing_year_month from tb_closing_date as c1 left join ( select substr(c3.closing_year_month, 1, 4) as year from tb_closing_date as c3 where c3.no = #{closingDateNo } ) as c2 on 1 = 1 where substr(closing_year_month, 1, 4) = c2.year and c1.closing_yn = true order by c1.closing_year_month desc limit 1 ;

select a.no as account_no , t.debtor_total as debtor_total , t.credit_total as credit_total from tb_account as a left join ( select t1.account_no , t1.debtor_total , t1.credit_total , t1.debtor_spot_month , t1.credit_spot_month from tb_trial_balance as t1 where t1.closing_date_no = #{lastestClosingDateNo } ) as t on t.account_no = a.no order by a.no ;

select v.no as no , a.no as account_no , a.name as account_name , v.reg_date as reg_date , i.amount as amount , i.amount_flag as amount_flag , a.parent1 as parent1 , a.parent2 as parent2 , a.parent3 as parent3 , a.parent4 as parent4 , a.parent5 as parent5 from tb_vouchermanager_test as v join tb_item_test as i on v.no = i.voucher_no join tb_account as a on a.no = i.account_no ;
